tags.name: a11y-tab
tags.description:
`a11y-tab`

Events:

  * `a11y-tab-changed` - handles any change in the tab attributes

Attributes:

  * `flag` {`string`} - optional flag the tab, eg. `new`, `alert`, or `error`

  * `flag-icon` {`string`} - optional flag icon the tab, eg. `av:fiber-new`, `icons:warning`, or `icons:error`

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - whether the tab is hidden

  * `icon` {`string`} - icon for this tab, eg. `maps:local-airport`, `maps:local-bar`, or `notification:wifi`

  * `id` {`string`} - the unique identifier and anchor for the tab

  * `label` {`string`} - label for the tab

  * `__xOfY` {`string`} - tab x of y text, eg. `2 of 3`

  * `__toTop` {`string`} - the anchor back to the top of the tab list (`a11y-tabs` id)

Properties:

  * `flag` {`string`} - optional flag the tab, eg. `new`, `alert`, or `error`

  * `flagIcon` {`string`} - optional flag icon the tab, eg. `av:fiber-new`, `icons:warning`, or `icons:error`

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - whether the tab is hidden

  * `icon` {`string`} - icon for this tab, eg. `maps:local-airport`, `maps:local-bar`, or `notification:wifi`

  * `id` {`string`} - the unique identifier and anchor for the tab

  * `label` {`string`} - label for the tab

  * `__xOfY` {`string`} - tab x of y text, eg. `2 of 3`

  * `__toTop` {`string`} - the anchor back to the top of the tab list (`a11y-tabs` id)

attributes.description:

Property: flag

`id` {`string`} - the unique identifier and anchor for the tab

attributes.description:

tags.name: a11y-tabs
tags.description:
`a11y-tabs`

Events:

  * `responsive-element` - 

  * `responsive-element-deleted` - 

Attributes:

  * `active-tab` {`string`} - the id of the active tab

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface is disabled

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface is hidden

  * `icon-breakpoint` {`number`} - the minimum breakpoint for showing tab text with icons, or
- use `0` to always show icons only
- use `-1` to always show text with icons

  * `id` {`string`} - unique identifier/anchor for the tabbed interface

  * `layout-breakpoint` {`number`} - the minimum breakpoint for horizontal layout of tabs, or
- use `0` for horizontal-only
- use `-1` for vertical-only

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - the size of the tabs,
where `xs` is the smaller breakpoint
and `xs` is the larger breakpoint

  * `vertical` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface is in vertical layout mode

  * `__has-icons` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface has icons for each tab

  * `__items` {`any[]`} - an array of tab data based on slotted `a11y-tab` elements

  * `__observer` - a mutation observer to monitor slotted `a11y-tab` elements

Properties:

  * `activeTab` {`string`} - the id of the active tab

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface is disabled

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface is hidden

  * `iconBreakpoint` {`number`} - the minimum breakpoint for showing tab text with icons, or
- use `0` to always show icons only
- use `-1` to always show text with icons

  * `id` {`string`} - unique identifier/anchor for the tabbed interface

  * `layoutBreakpoint` {`number`} - the minimum breakpoint for horizontal layout of tabs, or
- use `0` for horizontal-only
- use `-1` for vertical-only

  * `responsiveSize` {`string`} - the size of the tabs,
where `xs` is the smaller breakpoint
and `xs` is the larger breakpoint

  * `vertical` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface is in vertical layout mode

  * `__hasIcons` {`boolean`} - whether the tabbed interface has icons for each tab

  * `__items` {`any[]`} - an array of tab data based on slotted `a11y-tab` elements

  * `__observer` - a mutation observer to monitor slotted `a11y-tab` elements

attributes.description:
`active-tab` {`string`} - the id of the active tab

Default: null
